alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:57AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Chippewa and eastern Mackinac Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 556 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of East Lake to 8 miles southwest of Brevort. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Moran and Allenville around 615 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include St. Ignace, Cedarville, Straits State Park, Evergreen Shores, Hessel, Mackinac Island, Stalwart, Goetzville, Potagannissing Bay, Saint Marys River and Detour Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa
